Class Fruit

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Organism
          Flora
              Fruit

public class Fruit
extends Flora

Fruit objects are created once the fruit growing timer on a tree reaches the fruit grow time, after which the fruit will rot until eaten.

Version:
Monday, October 21st, 2013
Author:
Daniel Chung

digest

public double[] digest(Organism eater)
Ensures that a fruit, if eaten, follows whoever ate it, and provides them food and water

Parameters:
Organism - eater The organism which has consumed this fruit
Returns:
double[] Array containing [0] amount of hunger satiated, [1] amount of thirst satiated

Creates a brand new tree in the spot that this fruit disappears, 20% of the time
